metadata.title: CVE-2024-27030 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:octeontx2-af: Use separate handlers for interrupts For PF to AF interruptvector and VF to AF vector same interrupt handler is registered which iscausing race condition. When two interrupts are raised to two CPUs at sametime then two cores serve same event corrupting the data.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
